medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began the night prior after eating pizza, associated with 3 bouts of non-bilious, non-bloody emesis. Pain was not described in intensity but worsened leading to emergency department presentation.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Small liver hemangiomas, myocarditis, fibroid, ovarian cysts. Past surgical history includes ear surgery/infections and rhinoplasty.
